thread.title: Coldplay to headline Glastonbury 2016 for the fourth time?
thread.title_full: Coldplay to headline Glastonbury 2016 for the fourth time?

author: Wires English | Press Trust of India
title: Coldplay to headline Glastonbury 2016 for the fourth time?
text:
Comments 
London, Oct 18: British rock band formed Coldplay are reportedly set to headline Glastonbury next year.Glastonbury Festival founder Michael Eavis has apparently booked them in for a two-hour slot, reported Independent online. (Also Read: Coldplay’s Chris Martin does an impromptu jig in Delhi!) 
“Michael likes getting things sorted as early as possible and having a solid, reliable Sunday headline act to send people home happy is a massive part of the booking process. 
“Coldplay are Glastonbury veterans and will have no problem filling a two-hour set that punters will love,” a source said.Glastonbury Festival were contacted but were unavailable for comment as they are currently focussing on their Oxfam auction as well as Eavis’ birthday this weekend. 
  1:38 PM Topics:
